verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%>, and <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> with <S%H7651>it<s%>; seven <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H3899>therewith<s%>, even the bread of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>; for thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>haste<s%>: that thou mayest <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>.

And there shall <S%H7200>be<s%> no leaven <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee in all thy <S%H1366>borders<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; neither shall any of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, which thou <S%H2076>sacrificest<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, <S%H3885>remain<s%> all night until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

Thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> within <S%H259>any<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>thee<s%>;

but at the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H2076>in<s%>, there thou shalt sacrifice the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, at the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, at the <S%H4150>season<s%> that thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1310>roast<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H6437>turn<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> unto thy <S%H168>tents<s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>; and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> no work <S%H4399>therein<s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shalt thou <S%H5608>number<s%> unto <S%H2490>thee<s%>: from the time thou beginnest to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the standing <S%H7054>grain<s%> shalt thou <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, which thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%>, according as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> blesseth <S%H1288>thee<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1121>thou<s%>, and thy son, and thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and thy <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, and thy <S%H519>maid-servant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, that are in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H4725>thee<s%>, in the place which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> that thou wast a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, after that thou hast <S%H622>gathered<s%> in from thy <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> and from thy <S%H3342>winepress<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H2282>feast<s%>, <S%H1121>thou<s%>, and thy son, and thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and thy <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, and thy <S%H519>maid-servant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, and the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, that are within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou keep a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>; because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in all thine <S%H8393>increase<s%>, and in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and thou shalt be altogether <S%H8056>joyful<s%>.

Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> shall all thy <S%H2138>males<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>; and they shall not <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7387>empty<s%>:
every <S%H376>man<s%> shall give as he is <S%H4979>able<s%>, according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> which he hath given <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

70 <S%H8199><s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> shalt thou <S%H5414>make<s%> thee in all thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H7626>thee<s%>, according to thy tribes; and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%>; neither shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%>; for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> doth <S%H5786>blind<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and <S%H5557>pervert<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

That which is <S%H6664>altogether<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> shalt thou <S%H7291>follow<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H2421>live<s%>, and <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H5193>plant<s%> thee an <S%H842>Asherah<s%> of any kind of <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, which thou shalt make <S%H6213>thee<s%>.
Neither shalt thou set thee <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>; which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%>.
